name: JavaScript Fundamentals
description: Master the basics of JavaScript programming language from scratch. Learn variables, functions, loops, and more.

exercises.title: Variables and Data Types
exercises.description: Practice declaring variables and working with different data types

exercises.title: Functions and Scope
exercises.description: Learn how to create and use functions with different scopes

exercises.title: DOM Manipulation
exercises.description: Practice selecting and modifying HTML elements

lessons.title: Introduction to JavaScript
lessons.description: What is JavaScript and why it's important

lessons.title: Variables and Constants
lessons.description: Learn about let, const, and var
